title: 820-3476-A Short to ground around PP3V42_G3H.
message:
I have a 820-3476-A that has short to ground. Here is a picture explained where the short begins around PP3V42_G3H.

I injected voltage to the pp3v42_g3h and the short went away and the macbook started working. Anyways the short came back so what should i do now?

title: 820-3476-A Short to ground around PP3V42_G3H.
message: Found out that the adapter that connect to the magsafe was burned for no reason...

title: 820-3476-A Short to ground around PP3V42_G3H.
message: Inject voltage again and see if anything heats up, there is no magic solution for this. It is a flaky capacitor....

title: 820-3476-A Short to ground around PP3V42_G3H.
message: Well i found the problem. It was the DC In board adapter that was bad...
